Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: AMENDMENT TO PROFESSIONAL SERVICES AGREEMENT BY AND BETWEEN THE UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS AND THE TENNESSEE BOARD OF REGENTS This Amendment to the Professional Services Agreement (“Agreement”) dated September 15, 2003 by and between University of Memphis (“UOM”) and the Tennessee Board of Regents (“TBR”) is made, entered into and effective November 11, 2006. WITNESSETH: WHEREAS, UOM and TBR have entered into the Agreement subject to certain modifications, clarifications and changes contained in this Amendment; and WHEREAS, UOM and TBR agree, through this Amendment, to reflect certain modifications, additions and clarifications to UOM’s terms and conditions in the Professional Services Agreement. NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration for the mutual covenants undertaken herein, the parties hereby agree to amend the terms and conditions of the Agreement specifically as set forth herein: 1. Item C.4. The term of the Agreement shall be extended to December 31, 2007. 2. Item B. The TBR agrees to compensate the UOM as follows: 1. Payment Terms and Conditions: a. The contract amount of $582,802 will be due in 12 equal monthly payments beginning January 1, 2007. b. Payments to UOM as noted in item a. above shall be made after receipt of invoice for services performed. The final payment shall be made only after the UOM has completely performed its duties under this agreement. 2. In no event shall the liability of the TBR under this contract amendment exceed $582,802. 3. Prevailing Documents. In the event of any conflict or inconsistency between the terms and conditions of this Amendment and the Agreement, the terms of this Amendment shall prevail. Termination. This agreement shall terminate either on December 31, 2007, or upon written notice by one party to the other. UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS TENNESSEE BOARD OF REGENTS By: Charles Manning, Chancellor Date:#/f 'Q
